lead_paragraph: Ivo Karlovic set a U.S. Open record on Tuesday when he banged down 61 aces on his way to a first round victory over Taiwan's Lu Yen-Hsun.

headline.print_headline: Karlovic Sets U.S. Open Record With 61 Aces in Win Over Lu
headline.main: Karlovic Sets U.S. Open Record With 61 Aces in Win Over Lu

snippet: Ivo Karlovic set a U.S. Open record on Tuesday when he banged down 61 aces on his way to a first round victory over Taiwan's Lu Yen-Hsun....
